alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Orleans; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 7:10PM CDT until July 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Orleans Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Metairie to 6 miles northeast of Meraux, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Chalmette, East New Orleans, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Elmwood, River Ridge, Arabi, Bridge City, Waggaman, Meraux, New Orleans Armstrong Airport and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 256. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
